flawed_nl_solution:
Jonsey is awake for 72/2 hours because 24 x (2/3) = <<24*(2/3)=72/2>>72/2
Jonsey spends 1/2 her day inside because 1 - (1/2) = 1/2
Jonsey spend 18 hours inside because 72/2 x (1/2) = <<72/2*(1/2)=18>>18
Riley is awake for 18 hours because 24 x (3/4) = <<24*(3/4)=18>>18
Riley spends 2/3 of his day inside because 1 - (1/3) = 2/3
Riley spends 12 hours inside because 18 x (2/3) = <<18*(2/3)=12>>12
In total they spend 30 hours inside because 18 + 12 = <<18+12=30>>30
On average, they spend 15 hours inside because 30 / 2 = <<30/2=15>>15
#### 15

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 72/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
